verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: snow] to [V: make] [ARG1: another appearance] snow made an appearance for the first time this year on friday and some of us will likely see it again before the end of the weekend were you as shocked as i was to see snow falling from the sky on friday even though temperatures here at ground level were in the 40s enough evaporation occurred iowa snow
